action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client application. The user is viewing an email with the subject "Rescheduling Meeting". The email is from Fujitsu and proposes rescheduling a meeting from 2024-11-17 16:00~17:00 to 17:00~18:00.
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "Sync" button.
action.program_description: The email client is open and displaying an email thread.
